about_the_game: A gripping detective series filled with mystery and riddles awaits you! You will investigate the deaths of people under strange circumstances. A place once filled with fun and laughter now horrifies its visitors. They say the Amusement Park is haunted, but where's the proof? Then, a woman, Allison, finds you. She seeks help to uncover what happened to her beloved sister. Could her sister be another victim of the ghosts as well? Unravel the tangled web of enigmas and piece the puzzle together. Evil spirits are on the loose! Darkness is descending upon the city, and only you can stop it. Don't be afraid of the dark side, for it won't be able to consume you. Remember, the fate of many restless souls rests in your hands! Challenge your investigative skills in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!
